description:
A supporting character who was Kuroyanagi`s classmate in college and the president of a major detective agency in America. Kidd is used in many instances in the manga and anime as a sort of deus ex machina in reactions or flashbacks from a masseuse to an attorney or the head of a private investigation firm.
For comedic effect, he always looks at the camera with the face from the same angle, no matter how much it needs to be turned
name: Brad Kidd
